channel.title: Will Gorman on Engineering Health
channel.description: Recent content in Will Gorman on Engineering Health

item.title: Continuous Delivery for DC/OS with Spinnaker
item.description: Last fall our team (Mike Tweten, Trevin Teacutter, and Zameer Sura) started working on the problem of automating DC/OS deployments in a way that wouldn’t require multiple teams to duplicate effort and tie themselves directly to DC/OS APIs. While DC/OS certainly makes the act of deploying an application much easier than anything we’ve used previously, there are still many different ways you could choose to layer on deployment strategies and integrate with continuous delivery systems.
